DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective compare effectiveness tolerance Amitiza® ( lubiprostone ) plus GoLYTELY® ( polyethylene glycol-electrolyte solution ) versus placebo GoLYTELY ® ( polyethylene glycol-electrolyte solution ) bowel cleanse preparation colonoscopy .
DOC.brief_title: Amitiza® Plus GoLYTELY® Versus Placebo Plus GoLYTELY® Outpatient Colonoscopy Preparation
DOC.criteria: Subject least 18 year old Subject good health Subject undergo screen colonoscopy Subject spontaneous bowel movement least every 48 hour Subject renal insufficiency demonstrate serum creatinine > 1.4mg/dL Subject Type 1 diabetes Subject past present diagnosis Congestive Heart Failure Subject past present diagnosis inflammatory bowel disease Subject previous colon resection Subject preexist electrolyte abnormality Subject 3 spontaneous bowel movement daily
